body: @luckenzio true i thought this was just a generic ntr but with serenity

What a fucking waste. Its just a rehash of what already happened with the other characters; not only repetitive but it also makes the relationship with Serenity less spicy and just reduces her to the same state as everyone else.

Legitimately the most boring route this story could have taken.

... I...don't get it.

If you're gonna do a netorare story, why are you focusing so much on the guy getting cucked and not the guy doing it? I understand that sense of domination from having strong, beautiful women submit and I could...maybe understand getting it but this? This is just...confusing.

And why is this series making up so much of the few Serenity doujins?
Why do they love NTRing this guy so much
another boring messed up nasty shit with whore girls
Man I hate myself I already knew this was a sequel to the others and know it'd make me depressed but I still read through it because I read the previous ones
Jeez i dont understand why these artists waste their art on ntr
